data.title: Staffing Agency Santa Barbara, Maria, Lompoc
data.meta_description: Excel Personnel Services is a full-service staffing agency serving the Central Coast, with offices in Santa Barbara, Santa Maria, and Lompoc.
data.text:
We are a full-service staffing agency serving California’s Central Coast

We help companies use staffing as a tool to drive productivity, control personnel expenses, and manage hiring risks from our offices in Santa Maria, Santa Barbara, and Lompoc. Integrity and excellence are at the core of everything our employment agency does.

Are you an employer?

We can offer creative temporary staffing solutions and shorten your search for exceptional clerical, industrial, and professional employees.

More Information >>

Are you looking for work?Our three Central Coast staffing agency offices can help you find temporary and full-time jobs that are a terrific fit for your skills, experience, and interests.

More Information >>

We want to be your staffing partner!

We will become your staffing partner, giving you immediate access to top talent. We’ve established an extensive network that is the backbone of our organization, allowing us to source the most qualified people available and match them with outstanding job opportunities. Learn more about our employment agency and how we can help you.

More Information >>

Our Mission

At Excel Personnel, our mission is to provide our clients with Real Staffing Solutions, Real Commitment, and a Real Partnership.

Our staffing agency is dedicated to your business needs and will work to meet your workforce demands. We will become your human resource partner by providing you with immediate access to top talent, and by offering flexible staffing solutions so you may react quickly to ever changing business dynamics. Whether you’re looking to staff full-time or temp jobs, Excel Personnel Services is here to help.

We hold ourselves to the highest ethical and moral standards in the staffing industry. Our values, honesty, and high standards ensure the character and strength of our company. Our vision is to be the most respected and reliable staffing company in each of the cities we serve on the Central Coast: Santa Barbara, Lompoc, and Santa Maria.
